name: Soccer Star Smash
description:
Welcome to Soccer Star Smash!
Are you ready to smash it? Soccer Star Smash is hyper-charged arcade smash sport brought to you to test your skills and reflexes to the max.
It affords you very rare opportunity to bat fish across makeshift ping-pong table. After playing Soccer Star Smash! You won't look at table tennis in same way again.
Hit smashing and side-spin shots to take out your opponents in the most exciting sport game.
Soccer Go! is fun and addictive game where you can beat your opponent in 1-1 matches and become Soccer Star Smash! Star... Unlock new players with diverse shots & outplay to become Champaign in new Soccer Star Smash!

HOW TO PLAY

* Touch & Hold your finger to move Player
* Release your finger to Hit the football
* Follow the tutorial to learn game basics.

FEATURES
* Many Unique Players
* Unlock Levels
* Easy Controls
* Exciting challenges!!
* Intense Ping Pong smash hitting action
* Vibration force feedback
* Amazing Sound Effects & Graphics

We would love to hear your feedback. Contact us at nabeel@invoguesol.com
